explains: n. 静止状态（或时期）；郁积；内乱
wordGroup: blood stasis 血瘀；瘀血；血液停滞

sentences.en: Rock 'n' roll had entered a period of stasis.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐已经进入了一个停滞期。

sentences.en: Since 2005, the base class library was in stasis.
sentences.cn: 自2005年以来，基类库就处于停滞之中。

sentences.en: The cul-de-sac stasis of life in the suburban middle class?
sentences.cn: 是郊区中产阶级生活的静止的死胡同？
